title: Fun & Learning at VivoCity Kids Club
blurb: Discover a world of fun and learning experiences.
description: VivoCity Kids Club offers a variety of engaging activities and learning experiences designed to stimulate children's minds and bodies. From interactive play areas to educational workshops, there's something for every child to enjoy. The club provides a safe and supportive environment where kids can explore, learn, and grow. Activities include arts and crafts, storytelling sessions, and physical games. Parents can relax knowing their children are in a supervised and enriching environment. The Kids Club aims to foster creativity, curiosity, and a love of learning in all its young members. It's a perfect place for families to spend quality time together.

title: library@harbourfront: Reading and Learning Destination
blurb: A reading and learning destination for patrons!
description: Set against a splendid view of Sentosa, library@harbourfront is a reading and learning destination for patrons across Singapore with a collection of 200,000 volumes. It is designed with two distinct zones – one for adults and teens, and another for children – to provide conducive spaces and enhanced services that suit their reading and learning needs. The Children’s Zone enables young readers to learn through technology, with the first-ever makerspace for children aged three to nine, as well as Augmented Reality books that bring stories to life.

title: Play Court at VivoCity - Open-Air Playground Fun
blurb: Delight in engaging play areas at our open-air playground!
description: Kids will find a whole world of delight at the open-air playground on Level 2. The engaging play areas are sure to leave them wanting more. Experience the ultimate family entertainment with ZOOMOOV Safari! Immerse yourselves in an electrifying safari-themed adventure with our exciting electronic rides. From parents to kids, everyone is sure to have a wild time! Located at Level 2 Play Court, it's the perfect spot for families to enjoy a fun-filled day out. The playground offers a variety of play structures suitable for different age groups, ensuring that every child has something to enjoy. Parents can relax and watch their children play in a safe and secure environment.

title: ZOOMOOV Safari Family Entertainment at Vivocity
blurb: Electrifying safari-themed adventure with electronic rides!
description: Experience the ultimate family entertainment with ZOOMOOV Safari! Immerse yourselves in an electrifying safari-themed adventure with our exciting electronic rides. From parents to kids, everyone is sure to have a wild time! This safari-themed adventure is perfect for families looking for a fun and engaging activity. The electronic rides are designed to be safe and enjoyable for children of all ages, while parents can relax and watch their kids have a blast. It's a great way to spend quality time together and create lasting memories. The venue is family-friendly and suitable for all ages.
